10#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/render_delay_controller.h"
11
12#include <stddef.h>
13
14#include <algorithm>
15#include <memory>
16
17#include "absl/types/optional.h"
18#include "api/array_view.h"
19#include "api/audio/echo_canceller3_config.h"
20#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h"
21#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/delay_estimate.h"
22#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/downsampled_render_buffer.h"
23#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/echo_path_delay_estimator.h"
24#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/render_delay_controller_metrics.h"
25#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
26#include "rtc_base/atomic_ops.h"
27#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
28
29namespace webrtc {
30
31namespace {
32
33class RenderDelayControllerImpl final : public RenderDelayController {
34 public:
35 RenderDelayControllerImpl(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
36 int sample_rate_hz,
37 size_t num_capture_channels);
38
39 RenderDelayControllerImpl() = delete;
40 RenderDelayControllerImpl(const RenderDelayControllerImpl&) = delete;
41 RenderDelayControllerImpl& operator=(const RenderDelayControllerImpl&) =
42 delete;
43
44 ~RenderDelayControllerImpl() override;
45 void Reset(bool reset_delay_confidence) override;
46 void LogRenderCall() override;
47 absl::optional<DelayEstimate> GetDelay(
48 const DownsampledRenderBuffer& render_buffer,
49 size_t render_delay_buffer_delay,
50 const std::vector<std::vector<float>>& capture) override;
51 bool HasClockdrift() const override;
52
53 private:
54 static int instance_count_;
55 std::unique_ptr<ApmDataDumper> data_dumper_;
56 const int hysteresis_limit_blocks_;
57 const int delay_headroom_samples_;
58 absl::optional<DelayEstimate> delay_;
59 EchoPathDelayEstimator delay_estimator_;
60 RenderDelayControllerMetrics metrics_;
61 absl::optional<DelayEstimate> delay_samples_;
62 size_t capture_call_counter_ = 0;
63 int delay_change_counter_ = 0;
64 DelayEstimate::Quality last_delay_estimate_quality_;
65};
66
67DelayEstimate ComputeBufferDelay(
68 const absl::optional<DelayEstimate>& current_delay,
69 int hysteresis_limit_blocks,
70 int delay_headroom_samples,
71 DelayEstimate estimated_delay) {
72 // Subtract delay headroom.
73 const int delay_with_headroom_samples = std::max(
74 static_cast<int>(estimated_delay.delay) - delay_headroom_samples, 0);
75
76 // Compute the buffer delay increase required to achieve the desired latency.
77 size_t new_delay_blocks = delay_with_headroom_samples >> kBlockSizeLog2;
78
79 // Add hysteresis.
80 if (current_delay) {
81 size_t current_delay_blocks = current_delay->delay;
82 if (new_delay_blocks > current_delay_blocks &&
83 new_delay_blocks <= current_delay_blocks + hysteresis_limit_blocks) {
84 new_delay_blocks = current_delay_blocks;
85 }
86 }
87
88 DelayEstimate new_delay = estimated_delay;
89 new_delay.delay = new_delay_blocks;
90 return new_delay;
91}
92
93int RenderDelayControllerImpl::instance_count_ = 0;
94
95RenderDelayControllerImpl::RenderDelayControllerImpl(
96 const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
97 int sample_rate_hz,
98 size_t num_capture_channels)
99 : data_dumper_(
100 new ApmDataDumper(rtc::AtomicOps::Increment(&instance_count_))),
101 hysteresis_limit_blocks_(
102 static_cast<int>(config.delay.hysteresis_limit_blocks)),
103 delay_headroom_samples_(config.delay.delay_headroom_samples),
104 delay_estimator_(data_dumper_.get(), config, num_capture_channels),
105 last_delay_estimate_quality_(DelayEstimate::Quality::kCoarse) {
106 RTC_DCHECK(ValidFullBandRate(sample_rate_hz));
107 delay_estimator_.LogDelayEstimationProperties(sample_rate_hz, 0);
108}
109
110RenderDelayControllerImpl::~RenderDelayControllerImpl() = default;
111
112void RenderDelayControllerImpl::Reset(bool reset_delay_confidence) {
113 delay_ = absl::nullopt;
114 delay_samples_ = absl::nullopt;
115 delay_estimator_.Reset(reset_delay_confidence);
116 delay_change_counter_ = 0;
117 if (reset_delay_confidence) {
118 last_delay_estimate_quality_ = DelayEstimate::Quality::kCoarse;
119 }
120}
121
122void RenderDelayControllerImpl::LogRenderCall() {}
123
124absl::optional<DelayEstimate> RenderDelayControllerImpl::GetDelay(
125 const DownsampledRenderBuffer& render_buffer,
126 size_t render_delay_buffer_delay,
127 const std::vector<std::vector<float>>& capture) {
128 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(kBlockSize, capture[0].size());
129 ++capture_call_counter_;
130
131 auto delay_samples = delay_estimator_.EstimateDelay(render_buffer, capture);
132
133 if (delay_samples) {
134 if (!delay_samples_ || delay_samples->delay != delay_samples_->delay) {
135 delay_change_counter_ = 0;
136 }
137 if (delay_samples_) {
138 delay_samples_->blocks_since_last_change =
139 delay_samples_->delay == delay_samples->delay
140 ? delay_samples_->blocks_since_last_change + 1
141 : 0;
142 delay_samples_->blocks_since_last_update = 0;
143 delay_samples_->delay = delay_samples->delay;
144 delay_samples_->quality = delay_samples->quality;
145 } else {
146 delay_samples_ = delay_samples;
147 }
148 } else {
149 if (delay_samples_) {
150 ++delay_samples_->blocks_since_last_change;
151 ++delay_samples_->blocks_since_last_update;
152 }
153 }
154
155 if (delay_change_counter_ < 2 * kNumBlocksPerSecond) {
156 ++delay_change_counter_;
157 }
158
159 if (delay_samples_) {
160 // Compute the render delay buffer delay.
161 const bool use_hysteresis =
162 last_delay_estimate_quality_ == DelayEstimate::Quality::kRefined &&
163 delay_samples_->quality == DelayEstimate::Quality::kRefined;
164 delay_ = ComputeBufferDelay(delay_,
165 use_hysteresis ? hysteresis_limit_blocks_ : 0,
166 delay_headroom_samples_, *delay_samples_);
167 last_delay_estimate_quality_ = delay_samples_->quality;
168 }
169
170 metrics_.Update(delay_samples_ ? absl::optional<size_t>(delay_samples_->delay)
171 : absl::nullopt,
172 delay_ ? delay_->delay : 0, 0, delay_estimator_.Clockdrift());
173
174 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_render_delay_controller_delay",
175 delay_samples ? delay_samples->delay : 0);
176 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_render_delay_controller_buffer_delay",
177 delay_ ? delay_->delay : 0);
178
179 return delay_;
180}
181
182bool RenderDelayControllerImpl::HasClockdrift() const {
183 return delay_estimator_.Clockdrift() != ClockdriftDetector::Level::kNone;
184}
185
186} // namespace
187
188RenderDelayController* RenderDelayController::Create(
189 const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
190 int sample_rate_hz,
191 size_t num_capture_channels) {
192 return new RenderDelayControllerImpl(config, sample_rate_hz,
193 num_capture_channels);
194}
195
196} // namespace webrtc
